## PortfolioOptions interface

Optional Portfolio configuration. Include properties of [AlbumOptions](./photo-dir-to-json.albumoptions.md) that you would like passed to each Album instance.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface PortfolioOptions extends AlbumOptions 
```
**Extends:** [AlbumOptions](./photo-dir-to-json.albumoptions.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [skipAlbumNames?](./photo-dir-to-json.portfoliooptions.skipalbumnames.md) |  | string\[\] | _(Optional)_ A list of subdirectory names inside of the Portfolio path to skip. |
